General.Name: PetroVietnam Drilling & Well Service Corp
General.Description: Petrovietnam Drilling and Well Services Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides drilling rigs and drilling-related services to the oil and gas industry in the Socialist Republic of Vietnam and internationally. The company owns and operates offshore and onshore rigs. It also provides drilling-related and well technical services; and design, engineering, inspection, repairing, maintenance, workshop, trading and other, manpower and training program, and oil spill response and environment impact assessment services. The company was founded 2001 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
